title: [Psychology] Research: COVID-19 is echoed in dreams. The dream cluster named ‘Ignoring social distancing’ included hugging by mistake, hug-handshakes, restrictions related to handshakes, handshaking distance, lapses in social distancing, restrictions related to gatherings and crowded parties

[Physics] How Speaking Creates Droplets That May Spread COVID-19. High-speed video reveals the process that produces airborne saliva droplets during speech and also shows that lip balm can reduce droplet production.
